amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to expand nursery and seed capacity work to support reforestation and restoration by state, Tribal, and local governments and institutions of higher education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pettersen amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
